long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This is a chrome extension which helps developers/users to search the document. Just select the content which you want to look up and double press the 'Alt' key。Now idocs provides 4 search engines which are google, mdn, github, baidu and 2 languages, which you can config by click the icon。Hope you guys will like it.
